channel.title: [iClarity] Dark Bow
channel.description:
I have added rune c bow and bolts and all that. Now I need to get a working Dark Bow.
I have the spec done. Now can someone help me make the dark bow hit 2 times normally.

item.title: [iClarity] Dark Bow
item.dc:creator: @sheeba sheeba
item.description:
@sheeba wrote:

I tried to add this

[code]if(p.playerEquipment[p.playerWeapon] == 15156){
p.frame174(386, 050, 000);
p.createPlayersProjectile(p.absY, p.absX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 75, 249, 42, 31, -p.attackingPlayerId - 1);
p.setSpecialDelay(3);
p.setRangeDelay(3);
p.nextProjectile();
p.startAnimation(p.getSpecAnim());
p.combatDelay = 10;
p.gfx100(256);

						if (p.playerEquipment[p.playerCape] == 9007) {
							if (Misc.random(100) >= 30) {
								p.DeleteArrow();
							}
						} else {
							p.DeleteArrow();
						}[/code]

under

public static void Attack(clientHandler p) {

But I get nothing but errors.

Read full topic

item.title: [iClarity] Dark Bow
item.dc:creator: @Beastly1 Beastly¿
item.description:
@Beastly1 wrote:

Well, this is kind of like p00n99range’s,

Get a Magic Bow Special.

Change Hit range (Meaning change how low and how high it can hit*).

Then change the GFX of the Magic Bow Special to the regular Range GFX. So you’ll be having a Dark Bow shooting a magic bow special weakened, with correct range GFX :D.

    • (E.g. Lowest 10 Highest 25 Example Only)

Read full topic

item.title: [iClarity] Dark Bow
item.dc:creator: @p00n99range p00n99range
item.description:
@p00n99range wrote:

Just use a magic bow special, and increase the stats of the dark bow and in client.java. Then change the emote # on the magic bow special.

Read full topic
